{{descr}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from '../api.service'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-ver-tag', templateUrl: './ver-tag.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ver-tag.component.css'] }) export class VerTagComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private api: ApiService, private actRoute: ActivatedRoute){} descripciones = [] ngOnInit(): void { this.actRoute.params.subscribe(params => { const nombre = params['nombre']; this.api.getTag(nombre).subscribe((tag) => { this.descripciones = tag[0].descripcion }) }) } }
